name: Escape Velocity (Wuppos)
description:
Fly at neck-breaking-speed past difficult terrain to rescue your blue-bird friends in this unique flight-based platformer!

Escape Velocity is a platformer with a unique twist: instead of jumping you fly! Fly very fast and reach those difficult high-up platforms, but risk losing control and smashing into the hard rocks below... Will you be able to keep the right amount of speed to get to the caged birds?

  • A purely skill-based platformer where you use flight instead of the usual mechanics!
  • Use gravity to gain speed, or flap your wings to slow down. Balance controlability versus speed
  • 15 unique levels, with 7 hard-to-get collectable flying eggs
  • Made in one month for the "Finally Finish Something 2021" game jam
